What do we do

Most likely playing with some stuff

We are building an Open-Source stack

We do like open source projects, we can learn a lot from other people, that's why we are realising pretty much every project on GitHub.

The challenge?

We want to have fun, we want to elaborate extraordinary plans for the future of NextBlu and (possibly) the future of the Earth.
